Banner.Description: I am a Cloud and DevOps Engineer with experience in CI/CD, DevOps/DevSecOps, and Agile environments. I am passionate about building scalable and secure applications, implementing automation, robust monitoring, and SRE practices.
AboutMe.Title: About Rania
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am an IT Engineer specialized in Cloud and DevOps, with a strong background in CI/CD, DevOps/DevSecOps, and Agile environments.

I am passionate about building scalable and secure applications while implementing automation, robust monitoring, and Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) practices to ensure high system availability and performance.
Some of the technologies I have worked with extensively include:
Certifications.Title: Certifications

Certifications.Items.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Fundamentals
Certifications.Items.description: Demonstrates foundational knowledge of machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts and related Microsoft Azure services.

learningOutcomes: Describe Artificial Intelligence workloads and considerations
Describe fundamental principles of machine learning on Azure
Describe features of computer vision workloads on Azure
Describe features of Natural Language Processing (NLP) workloads on Azure
Describe features of conversational AI workloads on Azure

Certifications.Items.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
Certifications.Items.description: Validates foundational knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.

learningOutcomes: Describe cloud concepts
Describe Azure architecture and services
Describe Azure management and governance
Understand cloud service types and deployment models
Describe core Azure services and solutions

Certifications.Items.name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
Certifications.Items.description: Validates overall understanding of the AWS Cloud, independent of specific technical roles.

learningOutcomes: Define what the AWS Cloud is and the basic global infrastructure
Describe basic AWS Cloud architectural principles
Describe the AWS Cloud value proposition
Describe key services on the AWS platform
Describe basic security and compliance aspects of the AWS platform

Certifications.Items.name: Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
Certifications.Items.description: Demonstrates the ability to perform the responsibilities of a Kubernetes administrator.

learningOutcomes: Perform installation and configuration of Kubernetes clusters
Manage cluster architecture, installation, and configuration
Understand and apply workloads and scheduling
Implement services and networking
Manage storage and troubleshoot clusters

Certifications.Items.name: HashiCorp Certified: Terraform Associate
Certifications.Items.description: Validates practical knowledge of the Terraform open source version and cloud automation skills.

learningOutcomes: Understand Infrastructure as Code (IaC) concepts
Understand Terraform's purpose and benefits
Navigate Terraform workflow (Write, Plan, Apply)
Interact with Terraform modules
Use Terraform outside of core workflow

Certifications.Items.name: Docker Certified Associate
Certifications.Items.description: Validates skills in containerization and Docker platform expertise.

learningOutcomes: Understand Docker architecture and components
Work with Docker images and containers
Implement Docker networking and storage
Orchestrate containers using Docker Swarm
Apply Docker security best practices

Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: IT Engineer Intern
Description: Designed and developed a centralized HR digital platform to automate administrative workflows for 8,000+ employees
Implemented a secure DevSecOps CI/CD pipeline with automated testing, vulnerability scanning, and continuous deployment
Automated cloud infrastructure provisioning using Terraform and configuration management using Ansible
Implemented centralized monitoring for servers and Kubernetes pods using Prometheus and Grafana

overview.description: Architected and deployed a comprehensive HR Digitalization Platform designed to automate critical administrative workflows. The project transformed manual HR processes into a scalable, secure, cloud-native ecosystem with automated infrastructure, configuration management, and full observability.

contributions.title: Secure CI/CD (DevSecOps)
contributions.description: Designed and implemented a security-first CI/CD pipeline covering static, dynamic, dependency, container, infrastructure, and secret scanning across the entire software delivery lifecycle.
highlights: Multi-stage Jenkins pipeline with automated quality gates
SAST using SonarQube for code quality and vulnerability detection

contributions.title: Infrastructure & Configuration Automation
contributions.description: Automated infrastructure provisioning and system configuration using Infrastructure as Code and configuration management tools.
highlights: Cloud and Kubernetes provisioning with Terraform

contributions.title: Cloud-Native Orchestration & Monitoring
contributions.description: Deployed and monitored containerized applications on Azure Kubernetes Service with full observability.
highlights: Grafana dashboards for monitoring, alerting, and performance analysis

contributions.title: HR Functional Modules Implementation
contributions.description: Designed and implemented core HR functional modules to digitize and automate employee administrative processes.

results: Reduced HR administrative workload by 40% through process automation
Significantly reduced paper usage, supporting environmental sustainability goals and ISO-aligned digitalization initiatives
Decreased employee onboarding time from 10 days to a few minutes
Improved deployment reliability through infrastructure and configuration automation
Achieved high availability, horizontal scalability, and enterprise-grade security through cloud-native architecture

Experience.Jobs.Title: IT Engineer Intern
Description: Architected an automated Carbon Footprint Management platform to monitor and mitigate industrial CO2 emissions across Scopes 1, 2, and 3
Engineered a high-availability CI/CD pipeline and real-time Power BI analytics suite

overview.description: Developed an end-to-end GreenTech solution to digitize carbon tracking, transforming raw data into actionable sustainability insights.

contributions.title: Automated DevSecOps Pipeline
contributions.description: Established a modern delivery pipeline ensuring continuous feature delivery.
highlights: Security scanning with SonarQube and Trivy

results: Digitized carbon tracking for 50+ industrial facilities
Achieved 85% improvement in data accuracy
Automated 60% of regulatory and sustainability reporting

Experience.Jobs.Title: IT Engineer Intern

Overview.Description: Developed a cloud-native, real-time analytics and decision support platform that transforms AI smart-camera data into actionable KPIs, enabling data-driven operational and staffing decisions.

Description: Designed and implemented an AI-driven Decision Support System leveraging real-time computer vision data for operational optimization.
Built a scalable and resilient data ingestion pipeline on AWS to process high-volume smart-camera telemetry.
Developed RESTful backend services and an interactive frontend for real-time analytics visualization.
Implemented containerized deployments and cloud-native CI/CD pipelines for reliable, repeatable releases.
Applied DevSecOps best practices, integrating automated security and quality checks across the delivery lifecycle.

Modules.Title: Authentication & Authorization
Modules.Description: Secure administrator access using role-based authentication.

Modules.Title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboards
Modules.Description: Customizable dashboards to visualize footfall, occupancy, and performance KPIs in real time.

Modules.Title: Data Management Layer
Modules.Description: High-throughput ingestion, processing, and storage of smart-camera telemetry data.

Modules.Title: Monitoring & Observability
Modules.Description: End-to-end visibility into system health, performance, and availability.

Results: Improved operational decision-making using AI-driven real-time insights.
Eliminated manual reporting through automated data pipelines.
Increased platform reliability and scalability using Infrastructure as Code and container orchestration.
Delivered a secure, production-ready system following DevSecOps best practices.

Experience.Jobs.Title: IT Engineer Intern

Overview.Description: Developed a centralized IT Resource Management platform that provides real-time visibility into IT assets, licenses, and suppliers, enabling data-driven decision-making and cost optimization.

Description: Engineered a comprehensive IT Resource Management Platform to centralize asset, license, and supplier data.
Designed and implemented interactive real-time dashboards for IT assets, costs, and utilization metrics.
Recognized as a Top 10 final-year project with Technical Excellence award.

Modules.Title: Asset & License Management
Modules.Description: Track and manage all IT assets and software licenses in a centralized system.

Modules.Title: Real-Time Dashboards
Modules.Description: Visualize key IT metrics including asset utilization, costs, and license compliance in real time.

Modules.Title: Supplier Management
Modules.Description: Maintain and monitor supplier information to optimize procurement and contract decisions.

Results: Optimized IT resource utilization by 35%, ensuring efficient allocation of assets.
Reduced IT operational costs by 20% through better visibility and management.
Enhanced decision-making with real-time analytics and interactive dashboards.
Established a single source of truth for IT assets, licenses, and suppliers, improving transparency and control.

Languages.Title: Languages
FeatureProjects.Title: Highlighted Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Private Cloud Infrastructure with OpenStack
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Built a production-grade private cloud from scratch using OpenStack, integrated with Docker and Kubernetes to demonstrate modern cloud-native platform architecture on IaaS.

overview.description: Deployed a complete private cloud infrastructure using OpenStack, working directly with compute, networking, storage, identity, and orchestration services. Integrated with Docker and Kubernetes to demonstrate how modern cloud-native platforms run on top of IaaS.

pipelineFeatures.title: OpenStack Infrastructure Deployment
pipelineFeatures.description: Built complete IaaS platform with all core OpenStack services working together.
highlights: Nova for VM lifecycle management and compute scheduling
Neutron for software-defined networking and network isolation
Keystone for centralized identity and authentication
Glance for VM image management and distribution
Cinder and Swift for persistent block and object storage
Heat for infrastructure orchestration and automation

pipelineFeatures.title: Cloud-Native Integration
pipelineFeatures.description: Deployed containerized workloads on OpenStack infrastructure.
highlights: Docker containers running on OpenStack VMs
Kubernetes cluster deployed on Nova instances
Container orchestration on private cloud infrastructure

pipelineFeatures.title: Network & Storage Architecture
pipelineFeatures.description: Implemented enterprise-grade networking and storage solutions.

pipelineFeatures.title: Service Integration & Orchestration
pipelineFeatures.description: Automated infrastructure provisioning with Heat templates.
highlights: Complete service integration across all OpenStack components

results: Gained deep understanding of how cloud services interact behind the scenes
Mastered the complete VM lifecycle from authentication to scheduling, networking, storage, and launch
Demonstrated how OpenStack, Docker, and Kubernetes work together in real-world cloud architectures
Built foundation for understanding public cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud
Developed expertise in private cloud infrastructure and IaaS management

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: SnowMountain
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Ski management platform featuring a fully automated DevSecOps CI/CD pipeline integrating automation, security, and cloud orchestration.

overview.description: Developed as an academic project at ESPRIT, this platform leverages 11 microservices deployed on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) for scalable and secure cloud deployments.

pipelineFeatures.title: Source Code Management & CI
pipelineFeatures.description: GitHub integration for version control with Jenkins automation for builds, tests, and deployments.
highlights: GitLeaks scans for sensitive data leaks
Automated Maven builds with JUnit and Mockito testing
Real-time collaboration and code review workflows

pipelineFeatures.title: Code Quality & Security
pipelineFeatures.description: Multi-layered security scanning ensuring production-ready code.
highlights: OWASP Dependency Check for vulnerability scanning
Automated security gates in CI/CD pipeline

pipelineFeatures.title: Containerization & Orchestration
pipelineFeatures.description: Cloud-native architecture with Kubernetes deployment.
highlights: Terraform provisions infrastructure on Azure AKS
Docker Compose for multi-container integration testing

pipelineFeatures.title: Monitoring & Observability
pipelineFeatures.description: Comprehensive monitoring stack for real-time insights.
highlights: Prometheus metrics collection across all services
Automated email notifications for pipeline events

results: Reduced deployment time by 70% through automated CI/CD pipelines
Achieved 99.9% uptime during peak traffic periods
Ensured secure, production-ready microservices with zero security incidents
Enhanced team collaboration and development efficiency by 60%

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Elife Center
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: eCommerce platform with a fully automated DevOps CI/CD pipeline integrating full-stack development, containerization, cloud deployment, and monitoring.

overview.description: Developed with Spring Boot, Angular, and MySQL, deployed on Microsoft Azure for scalable and reliable performance with comprehensive monitoring.

pipelineFeatures.title: Continuous Integration & Deployment
pipelineFeatures.description: Jenkins-powered automation for seamless builds and deployments.

pipelineFeatures.title: Quality & Security First
pipelineFeatures.description: Integrated security and quality checks throughout the pipeline.

pipelineFeatures.title: Cloud-Native Architecture
pipelineFeatures.description: Kubernetes orchestration on Azure for scalability.

pipelineFeatures.title: Real-Time Monitoring
pipelineFeatures.description: Comprehensive observability with Prometheus and Grafana.

results: Delivered fast, reliable feature releases through automated CI/CD
Improved application scalability and reliability leveraging Azure cloud
Enhanced code quality and security across the entire platform
Accelerated full-stack development with efficient pipeline integration

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MicroCommerce
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Microservices-based eCommerce platform with a fully automated and secure DevOps pipeline for 11 services, enabling faster releases and enhanced security.

overview.description: Cloud-native microservices architecture developed with Gradle and Spring Boot, deployed on Kubernetes for production-ready, scalable eCommerce operations.

pipelineFeatures.title: Microservices CI/CD
pipelineFeatures.description: Automated pipeline for 11 independent microservices.
highlights: Jenkins automates builds, tests, and deployments for all services
Parallel pipeline execution for faster builds

pipelineFeatures.title: Security-First Approach
pipelineFeatures.description: Multi-layered security scanning at every stage.
highlights: Automated security gates prevent vulnerable deployments

pipelineFeatures.title: Cloud-Native Deployment
pipelineFeatures.description: Kubernetes orchestration for scalable microservices.
highlights: Docker creates secure containers for each service
Kubernetes enables auto-scaling and load balancing

pipelineFeatures.title: Comprehensive Monitoring
pipelineFeatures.description: Real-time observability across all microservices.
highlights: Prometheus collects metrics from all services

results: Reduced deployment time by 70% through fully automated pipelines
Handled traffic spikes with 99.9% uptime during peak periods
Enabled secure, scalable microservices architecture
Accelerated team collaboration using DevOps best practices

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: EspritCollab
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Student collaboration platform with multi-service integration, real-time monitoring, and event management capabilities.

overview.description: Developed with Spring Boot, Angular, and MySQL, deployed on private OpenStack cloud infrastructure with comprehensive monitoring and analytics.

pipelineFeatures.title: Private Cloud Deployment
pipelineFeatures.description: Built and deployed on OpenStack infrastructure for data sovereignty.
highlights: Full control over infrastructure and data

pipelineFeatures.title: Automated Integration
pipelineFeatures.description: Docker and Kubernetes for seamless service deployment.

pipelineFeatures.title: Real-Time Analytics
pipelineFeatures.description: Power BI dashboards for administrative insights.

pipelineFeatures.title: Performance Monitoring
pipelineFeatures.description: Prometheus and Grafana for system observability.

results: Enabled efficient collaboration among students with real-time tracking

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as possible.
